text.language: Rwf m~V] afermeyre qarok: w~ Iwann/c piref]wmc: je m~mon v/ettenywn] e~rok: qen nimici n~te nihiomi.
The mouth of God witnessed, to you O Baptizer, “No one is like you, among those born of women.”
Mulut Allah bersaksi, tentangmu, hai Pembaptis, "Tak ada yang sepertimu, di antara m’reka yang dilahirkan wanita.".
فم الله شهد لك يا يوحنا المعمدان لأنه ليس من يشبهك فى مواليد النساء.
